bibl.title: The Lexington Papyri: A New Discovery.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III
bibl.author: Morris, Royce L.B.

bibl.note: Lexington Theological Seminary (Kentucky). The collection consists of forty-six individual documents and one fragment of four leaves of a codex (late Roman and Byzantine period).
Morris Royce L.B., The Lexington Papyri: A New Discovery.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 901-903.
